motds.title: Party Parade Set
motds.body: Clowning around near these two is a dangerous act. Pop the wrong balloon and you'll find yourself back in the Lobby.
motds.id: Party Parade Set links to Item Shop

motds.title: First Spotlight Concert
motds.body: Singer, rapper, and songwriter Dominic Fike is ready to bring down the house. Join us on Saturday, September 12 at 5 PM EDT at the Main Stage.

messages.title: Keep Your Account Secure
messages.body: Avoid scam sites offering free V-Bucks. Epic will never ask for your password. Enable Two-Factor Authentication to help stay secure!

mac.title: Chapter 2 - Season 4 Notice
mac.body: Apple has blocked your ability to update Fortnite on the App Store, and has said they will terminate our ability to develop Fortnite for Apple devices. As a result, Chapter 2 - Season 4 (v14.00) is unavailable on your device.

androidGP.title: Chapter 2 - Season 4 Notice
androidGP.body: With the launch of Season 4, players on Google Play will be unable to play the new Season. On this platform, players can still play version v13.40.

ios.title: Chapter 2 - Season 4 Notice
ios.body: Apple has blocked your ability to update Fortnite on the App Store, and has said they will terminate our ability to develop Fortnite for Apple devices. As a result, Chapter 2 - Season 4 (v14.00) is unavailable on your device.

motds.title: Shootout - Snake Creek

Go play the community made Featured Island by HELLRAISERGaming

messages.title: Swamp Knight
messages.body: A mysterious hero whose Unearthly Treat perk gives him an edge against the Mist Monsters.

messages.title: Dungeons
messages.body: Fight monsters, dodge traps, gear up and descend into the depths to confront the raging evil below. Complete Dungeons to unlock Heroes, Candy, a Loading Screen, and more!

messages.title: Ragnarok
messages.body: The cold harbinger of fate returns! Grab this Hero to unlock the "Slow Your Roll" Team Perk and slow down enemies.
